history.subject: 在页面交换链表中出现了一个不在内存中的条目?
history.content:
在做页面交换的扩展实验时,由于要处理4个优先级的换入缓存策略,所以会查询access位和dirty位,结果发现选出来的页表居然不在内存中, 于是我将可交换的页链表打出, 发现最后一个页码很奇怪, 如下:

before swap[list] :307067->308067->309067->30a067->
c0306004
1000
after swap[list] :308067->309067->30a067->
swap_out: i 0, store page in vaddr 0x1000 to disk swap entry 2
write Virt Page b in fifo_check_swap
write Virt Page a in fifo_check_swap
page fault at 0x00001000: K/W [no page found].
before swap[list] :308067->309067->30a067->307067->
c0306008
2000
after swap[list] :309067->30a067->307067->
swap_out: i 0, store page in vaddr 0x2000 to disk swap entry 3
swap_in: load disk swap entry 2 with swap_page in vadr 0x1000
write Virt Page b in fifo_check_swap
page fault at 0x00002000: K/W [no page found].
before swap[list] :309067->30a067->307067->300->
c030600c
3000
after swap[list] :30a067->307067->300->
swap_out: i 0, store page in vaddr 0x3000 to disk swap entry 4
swap_in: load disk swap entry 3 with swap_page in vadr 0x2000
write Virt Page c in fifo_check_swap
page fault at 0x00003000: K/W [no page found].
before swap[list] :30a067->307067->309067->400->
c0306010
4000
after swap[list] :307067->309067->400->
swap_out: i 0, store page in vaddr 0x4000 to disk swap entry 5
swap_in: load disk swap entry 4 with swap_page in vadr 0x3000
write Virt Page d in fifo_check_swap
page fault at 0x00004000: K/W [no page found].
before swap[list] :307067->309067->30a067->500->
c0306014
5000
after swap[list] :309067->30a067->500->
swap_out: i 0, store page in vaddr 0x5000 to disk swap entry 6
swap_in: load disk swap entry 5 with swap_page in vadr 0x4000
count is 0, total is 7
check_swap() succeeded!
这个在fifo里面肯定是正确的, 因为每次从前面取,都是在内存中的, 从最后一个bit就可以看出来, 但是在后面的几次swap的时候, 这个链表的最后居然出现了300, 400, 500, 这个不是链表头(做过过滤), 对于做extendclock会有影响, 最后面加入的这个是什么?
请考察这一列表的元素是什么时候插入和删除的
